title: Research Agent with Multi-Step Planning
description: Build an AI agent that researches topics, analyzes sources, and generates comprehensive reports

technical: Use Claude API with tool calling
Implement retry logic for API failures
ui: Live agent progress display (thinking, searching, analyzing)
Final report with sections and citations

successCriteria.description: Report covers 5+ relevant sources with accurate information
Clear thought process visible, logical planning
Well-organized report with intro, body, conclusion, citations
Gracefully handles API failures, retries appropriately
Clean code, proper types, good UX

testTopics: Recent developments in AI agent architectures

technicalGuidance.agentPattern: Use ReAct (Reason + Act) with Claude tool calling
technicalGuidance.searchAPI: Tavily Search API (free tier: 1000 requests/month) or Brave Search API
technicalGuidance.toolDefinition: Follow Claude's tool use schema with name, description, input_schema
technicalGuidance.loopControl: Max 10 iterations, break when agent returns final_answer
technicalGuidance.caching: Cache search results for same queries (5 min TTL)

deploymentRequirements.instructions: Deploy to Vercel, configure API keys, set rate limits

extensionIdeas: Add web scraping tool to read full articles
Add visualization tool for creating charts/diagrams
Build database query tool for structured data
Add email tool to send reports
Implement parallel search across multiple sources
Add fact-checking tool to verify claims

rubric.exceeds: Report is comprehensive, well-structured, cites 7+ sources, agent reasoning is transparent, handles errors gracefully, polished UI
rubric.meets: Report covers 5+ sources, logical structure, visible agent steps, basic error handling, functional UI
rubric.approaching: Report has 3-4 sources, some structure issues, limited visibility into agent reasoning, minimal error handling
rubric.incomplete: <3 sources, poorly structured, agent loop doesn't work properly, or not deployed
